name: Tally Home
description:
Tally Home - can you find the way home?

Within this problem-solving path game, there are endless routes to take with multiple obstacles to negotiate and dead ends to avoid.

The Goal

Figure out the correct route. Move your markers until all numbered squares tally to zero.

Negotiate the fences, toggle gates and warp around the play field while you nut out the correct order to make your moves.

If you’re a puzzle lover this game is sure to get your brain juice flowing.

See if you can tally down the squares to home!

Levels

Levels are generally increasing in difficulty ranging from what we consider easy to hair-tearing difficult.

There are over 100 levels in total with more to come.

Yes, each level has a solution!

Don’t worry there are unlimited undos.

How to Play

The interactive tutorial levels at the beginning will set you off to a good start. However if you are a stickler for written rules:

  • All squares must be zero to win.
  • Each level has one or two coloured markers which can move up, down, left or right.
  • Each time you land on a square its number will decrease by one.
  • You can not land on a zero square.
  • When present you must finish on the home squares.
  • Black fences and coloured gates block your way.
  • Coloured switches toggle the coloured gates.
  • You can wrap around the outside of the field.

Want an iOS version?  Click on the notify me link on my homepage or put a request in the comments and follow me.  I'll put in the work if the requests are there.
